metadata.scenario: Customer service interaction about a delayed package

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to find out where my package is. The tracking information hasn't updated in three days and it was supposed to arrive yesterday. The tracking number is ABC-123-XYZ.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear your package is delayed. I have located your package with the tracking number ABC-123-XYZ. It appears to be at our local distribution center. There was an unexpected surge in volume, which is causing delays. We anticipate delivery within 2 business days.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Two business days?! That's ridiculous! Why wasn't I notified about a delay? I needed this package by today. This is completely unacceptable! Can you tell me *why* there was a surge? And is there any way to expedite the shipping?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I apologize for the inconvenience, sir/madam. Unfortunately, I don't have the specifics on the cause of the surge. Expedited shipping is not available at this time. However, I have sent a request to the distribution center to prioritize your package. You should see an update to the tracking information within 24 hours.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Alright, I guess. If I don't see an update in 24 hours, I'm going to want a refund on the shipping costs. Thanks for your time.
